isis.stitle: CAB: DAYCAB AND SLEEPER CAB for ProStar, ProStar Premium, and ProStar Limited Models - REMOVE - CAB DOOR WINDOW RUN CHANNELS

svcsubproc.title: Remove Cab Door Window Run Channels on Daycab and Sleeper Cab

step1.para:
Remove cab door trim panel, refer to
CAB DOOR TRIM PANEL
. If cab door is equipped with electric door window and locks, refer to Remove Cab Door Trim Panel with Electric Door Window and Locks on Daycab and Sleeper Cab
. If cab door is equipped with manual door window and locks, refer to Remove Cab Door Trim Panel with Manual Door Window and Locks on Daycab and Sleeper Cab.

Remove cab door vapor barrier, refer to
CAB DOOR VAPOR BARRIER
. If cab door is equipped with electric door window and locks, refer to Remove Cab Door Vapor Barrier with Electric Door Window and Locks on Daycab and Sleeper Cab
. If cab door is equipped with manual door window and locks, refer to Remove Cab Door Vapor Barrier with Manual Door Window and Locks on Daycab and Sleeper Cab.

Remove cab door modular door hardware assembly, refer to
MODULAR DOOR HARDWARE ASSEMBLY
. For removing cab door modular door hardware assembly, refer to Remove Cab Door Modular Door Hardware Assembly on Daycab and Sleeper Cab.

With the cab door modular door hardware assembly (Item 1, Figure 46)
removed and placed on a suitable work surface. Remove cab door outer cab door handle, refer to
OUTER CAB DOOR HANDLE
. For removing cab door outer cab door handle, refer to Remove Cab Door Outer Cab Door Handle on Daycab and Sleeper Cab.

Remove cab door latch, refer to
CAB DOOR LATCH
. For removing cab door latch, refer to Remove Cab Door Latch on Daycab and Sleeper Cab.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 63 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: With modular door hardware assembly (Item 1) laying on it's back. Using a flat blade screw driver (Item 2), push in locking tab (Item 3) at the top of window run channel (Item 4) on the right, and slide window run channel to the left out of modular door hardware assembly, driver side shown.

Using a flat blade screw driver, push in locking tab (Item 5) at the bottom of window run channel (Item 4) on the right, and slide window run channel to the left out of modular door hardware assembly (Item 1), driver side shown. Lay window run channel out of the way and save for installation, unless damaged and being replaced.

To remove the window run channel (Item 6) on the left, use a flat blade screw driver and push in locking tab (Item 7) at the top of window run channel, and slide window run channel to the right out of modular door hardware assembly (Item 1), driver side shown.

Using a flat blade screw driver, push in locking tab (Item 8) at the bottom of window run channel (Item 6) on the left, and slide window run channel to the right out of modular door hardware assembly (Item 1), driver side shown. Lay window run channel out of the way and save for installation, unless damaged and being replaced.
Repeat procedure to remove passenger side cab door window run channels.

figure.caption: Figure 63. Cab Door Window Run Channels
